hero.subtitle: Ahl al-Sunnah wa’l-Jamaa’ah
hero.hero_description: The text of Imam Tahawi's Aqida is widely accepted as a sound and reliable source of the Aqida of Ahl al-Sunnah wa'l-Jamaa'ah and represents what the majority of Muslims have believed for over 1,400 years and continue to believe today.
